author: Vertyco
description: Ark: Survival Evolved server manager and crosschat.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data about users.
install_msg:
Thank you for installing! Use `[p]arktools` for more info.
Be sure to run the refresh command after adding/removing clusters and servers.
**Disclosure:** This cog may use considerable network traffic over time depending on how many servers you have.
This cog stores Gamertag Names, time played per map, and API keys for Xbox self-host accounts.
